description: Update an existing material site reading material type.
permissions: User must be practically a member of the broker for the material site or be a manager member of the material supplier for the material site.
side_effects: Updates a material site reading material type mapping.
validation_notes: Requires the material site reading material type ID argument. At least one field must be provided to update. External ID must be unique per material site and integration config. If material type is set, it must belong to the same material supplier as the material site. Material site cannot be changed after creation.

flags.name: --material-type
flags.description: Material type ID (empty to clear; e.g., 456).
flags.validation: Empty string clears the material type relationship.
